name: Ancient Battle Lite
description:
The bad stickmen are attacking. Good ones are fighting hard, but the bad ones are too strong. It seems that good ones need a skilled commander. Will you help them? To defeat the enemy, you’ll need nerves of steel and smart strategy.

Highlights:
• Multiple kinds of warriors to choose
•Challenging gameplay
• Easy to learn but hard to master
•Online leaderboard
•It is free!
